# Bob's House of Pizza — Menu

## Pizza

| Size | Cheese | 1 Topping | 2 Toppings | Supreme |
|------|--------|-----------|------------|---------|
| Personal (8") | $8.99 | $10.49 | $11.99 | $13.99 |
| Medium (12") | $13.99 | $15.99 | $17.99 | $19.99 |
| Large (16") | $17.99 | $20.49 | $22.99 | $25.99 |

**Toppings:** Pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, onions, black olives, jalapeños, pineapple, anchovies, extra cheese

**Specialty Pizzas:**
- The Bob: pepperoni, sausage, mushroom, green pepper, onion — $22.99 (lg)
- Meat Lover's: pepperoni, sausage, ham, bacon, ground beef — $24.99 (lg)
- Veggie Delight: mushroom, green pepper, onion, tomato, black olive — $22.99 (lg)
- BBQ Chicken: grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onion, cilantro — $23.99 (lg)

## Sides
- Garlic Bread: $4.99
- Mozzarella Sticks (6): $7.99
- Garden Salad: $5.99
- Caesar Salad: $6.99
- Wings (10): $12.99

## Drinks
- 2-Liter Soda: $3.49
- Bottled Water: $1.99

## Hours
Mon-Thu: 11 AM - 9 PM
Fri-Sat: 11 AM - 11 PM
Sun: 12 PM - 8 PM

## Delivery
Free delivery within 3 miles on orders over $20. Call 612-555-1234 or order at bobshouseofpizza.com.
